question: Tom smith's arthritis is due to -
exp: Ans. is 'a' i. e., Pyogenic infection in infancy Tom smith arthritis (septic arthritis of infancy)o Tom smith arthritis is the septic arthritis of hip joint, occurs in infancy. At this stage head of the femur is cartilaginous and is rapidly and completely destroyed by the pyogenic process. Onset is acute with abscess formation, which heals rapidly after spontaneous bursting outside or after incision and drainage. Quite often it is a delayed presentation and the child is brought for consultation when he begins to walk with a limp. On examination:-i) Limb is shortii) Hip movements are increased in all directions. iii) There is instability with positive telescoping.

question: Frozen pelvis is seen in -
exp: Ans. is 'b' i. e., Potts disease o A term for significant involvement of the pelvic floor by malignancy, usually carcinoma, or ttuberculosis; in which there is massive extension of pathology to the urinary bladder, female genital tract, and sigmoid colon. Adequate resection of a frozen pelvis is virtually impossible; chemotherapy and radiation therapy are palliative at best.

question: Tom Smith arthritis is:
exp: Ref: Apley's System of Orthopaedics and Fractures, 9th edition. Explanation: TOM SMITH ARTHRITISIt is septic arthritis of the hip in the infant. The femoral head at this stage is completely cartilaginous. If not treated early, the whole femoral head is destroyed, without any potential for a normal hip joint. Treatment - Urgent arthrotomy and lavage of the hip joint. Sample has to be obtained from the hip. either by aspiration or on arthrotomy, prior to starting on antibiotic, unless patient is toxic. Empirical antibiotics are started. Definitive antibiotic is started once organism culture and antibiotic sensitivity testing reports are available. ORGANISMS CAUSING SEPTIC ARTHRITIS AT DIFFERENT AGESInfants < 6 monthso Caused by wide range of organismso Broad spectrum bacteriocidal agent is required. o DOC-Cloxacillin, Methicillin, Kanamycin. 6 months to 2 yearso Most common organism is Haemophilias influenza. o DOC-Ampicillin. More than 4 yearso Most common organism is staphylococcio DOC-Methicillin or Cloxaciilin.
